ideologies.name: Scientific
ideologies.flavorText: Scientific ideology is focused on the pursuit of knowledge and understanding of the universe.

ideologies.name: Military
ideologies.flavorText: Military ideology is focused on the use of force to achieve goals.

ideologies.name: Cultural
ideologies.flavorText: Cultural ideology is focused on the creation and preservation of art and culture.

ideologies.name: Financial
ideologies.flavorText: Financial ideology is focused on the accumulation and management of wealth.
